alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 4:31AM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches valleys, locally up to 6 inches benches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected, primarily north of Ogden. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas near and south of Ogden have mixed with or changed to rain overnight. Any rain is expected to change back to snow Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
